"Manon has heard that Aina has become an instructor, and says that she plans to try her best to help too. Her immediate priority is to find a way to stop the production of DOLLS. To accomplish this, she first plans to investigate how energy is distributed across Halpha, and to learn how DOLLS are manufactured."
